Posts.Content: Thanks for the responses. Yes, I did have a repeat test. First was .7 second was .9. It is .9 and not .09. I'm 65. Thanks again for the feedback
Posts.Title: Reoccurence After Nine Years(?)

Posts.Content: Hi, I was diagnosed with pc 9 years ago with a 4/3 Gleason with a tertiary 5 and had my prostate removed (Da Vinci). I went for my regular PSA checkups for a while. However, I put the PSA testing on hold while I addressed other health issues. So, after 5 years, I just got retested and my PSA was .9. I'm waiting to see the urologist so we can discuss options. If he recommends SRT, I'm not worried about that. What I am concerned about is should I be worried that I waited so long? Would the .9 be higher if it had spread? Does anyone have a similar situation? Thank in Advance, Glenn
Posts.Title: Reoccurence After Nine Years(?)
